oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Island Home
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McCrary & Branson, Knoxville, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Island Home, Perez Dickinson home and farm. Part of the formal gardens at "Island Home," the country estate of Col. Perez Dickinson. This was at the north side of the house and shows the carriage entrance. This was at the intersection of driveways at the side of the carriage house. Taken about 1887. Caption by Mrs. Fayette Van Deventer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houses; Gardens; Gardening;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
